medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressive dyspnea and abnormal findings on chest imaging.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began approximately 6.5 months prior, starting with fatigue, fever, chills, and cough productive of rust-colored sputum; symptoms persisted despite multiple courses of antibiotics. Dyspnea on exertion increased progressively during the past 3 months.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of electronic-cigarette use (vaping), anxiety, attention deficitâ€“hyperactivity disorder, childhood asthma, and allergies.
medical_history.family_history: Father with obstructive sleep apnea; paternal grandfather with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease; maternal grandfather with rheumatoid arthritis and possible pulmonary fibrosis; three maternal cousins with multiple sclerosis.
medical_history.social_history: Lives with roommates in a college dormitory, attends college studying landscape architecture with exposures to grasses, fertilizers, and pesticides. Reports drinking 12 beers every weekend and occasional marijuana use; no history of tobacco use, but began daily e-cigarette use 8 months prior.
